notes: Stacks multiplicatively with other sources of percentage-based cooldown reductions.
abilities.description: Reduces the cooldown time of all spells and items by 25%.

name: Octarine Core
description: At the core of spellcraft are spectrums only the very gifted can sense.
trivia: Octarine Core's name is an homage to the comic fantasy book series Discworld, paying tribute to the writer Terry Pratchett who died about a month prior to the item's release. In the series, Octarine is a fictional color which is described as "resembling a flourescent greenish-yellow purple". The color can only be seen by wizards and by cats, which is also referenced by Octarine Core's item lore.

In the series, Octarine is a fictional color which is described as "resembling a flourescent greenish-yellow purple". The color can only be seen by wizards and by cats, which is also referenced by Octarine Core's item lore.
The components of Octarine Core before version 7.27 are the same as the components of the Pre-6.60 Aghanim's Scepter.
tips: If you have a hero with short cooldowns on your abilities, consider this item; casting your spells more often in a single fight is a major boon, and the increased casting range allows you to do so without having to stay in the middle of the fight for an extended duration.
